abstract: Legal experts say biggest challenge Volkswagen faces is compensating owners of its vehicles rigged with software to fraudulently pass diesel emission tests; lawsuits loom.
lead_paragraph: Shareholders have sued the company, and regulators plan to take action, but legal experts said Volkswagen’s biggest test would be making customers whole.

headline.main: Compensating Car Owners Will Be Big Test for Volkswagen
headline.print_headline: Compensating Owners of Rigged Cars Will Be Big Test for Volkswagen

snippet: Shareholders have sued the company, and regulators plan to take action, but legal experts said Volkswagen’s biggest test would be making customers whole.
